related_post.text: Where is a good place I can learn about venvs?

so_post.text: > Where is a good place I can learn about venvs?@pakeke this is a good thread to see the different optionshttps://stackoverflow.com/questions/41573587/whatisthedifferencebetweenvenvpyvenvpyenvvirtualenvvirtualenvwrappeand then just the Python official docs for `venv`
